name: Tales in the TAXI
description:
Your driving and choices will change your destiny⸺



『Tales in the TAXI』 is a multi-ending adventure game in which the story diverges by driving a taxi and talking with passengers.

Driving Part : Take our passengers where they want to go!

A wide variety of passengers are rode in the taxi!
Let's understand their intentions and take them to the proper destination!

Conversation Part : Listen to passengers' problems and select appropriate solutions!

The passengers in this taxi are having some kind of problem.
Let's listen carefully to their worries and choose the best answer.
developers: まんぷくえんたていんめんと
publishers: まんぷくえんたていんめんと
